reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater jacket to be of good quality and appreciate its true-to-size fit. They describe it as classy-looking, more formal than a regular sweater, and versatile enough to dress up or down. The garment is heavy enough for cooler days, thick enough for cold winter days, and warm enough for cool fall evenings, with one customer noting it's perfect for Texas winters.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Classiest Coatigan!
items.body: This coat is very well made, soft, and looks classy. I love the color (tan/camel/khaki), and the open front design without buttons is a nice touch. The pockets are generously sized and comfortable. Perfect for slipping a phone into. I love that you can style it so many different ways! Read more
items.author: Nikki Sue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This sweater is a must have. It's as classy as it is comfy. It is true to size. The real test...I have laundered once, machine wash cold gentle cycle. Put in the dryer for a few minutes to reduce wrinkles. Then line dried. It retained its shape perfectly with no pilling on the fabric. The pockets lay nice and flat Read more
items.author: Jean C.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sweater
items.body: Like the quality, fit and price of this sweater buy didn't like the color. I returned for that reason. Read more
items.author: Dana H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, classy and travels GREAT
items.body: I easily steamed packing wrinkles out with steam iron on low . I bought the off white color which is beautiful, a true cream , not yellowish or tan at all. Was concerned it might attract dirt- it does not . I wore it back and forth on four cross country flights , crammed into airplane seats, folded into dingy plastic bins through security, and as soon as it was unfolded or I stood up- looked great ! No wrinkles , no spots . Fabric is soft and thick , not see through , has some stretch but does not stretch out . Perfect weight , like a light jacket, ideal for cool days or cold indoor AC but it isn’t a coat and I would not wear it over anything very thick . Superb polished look with leggings or yoga pants for travel or whatever . Has two pockets , deep enough for my iPhone but I wouldn’t put anything much bigger in there to avoid deforming the pockets . Great addition to a classic capsule wardrobe . Read more
items.author: Elsie Pie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So good, I bought another one
items.body: I am so glad I purchased this ANRABESS cardigan! It’s the perfect blend of style and comfort, making it a go-to piece for fall. I already gad a tan one and just bought a black one. Soft and Warm: The knit material feels high-quality and cozy without being too heavy. It’s great for layering on cooler days. Flattering Fit: The open-front design and length are super flattering. It drapes beautifully and looks great over anything, from casual jeans and a T-shirt to dressier outfits. Versatile Style: The cardigan has a chic, polished look, but it’s still casual enough for everyday wear. The neutral colors and subtle patterns make it easy to pair with different outfits. Durable and Well-Made: The stitching and fabric are excellent quality. I’ve worn it multiple times, and it still looks brand new after washing. Perfect for Fall: It’s lightweight yet warm, ideal for layering during those crisp autumn mornings or cozy evenings. This cardigan is the perfect addition to any fall wardrobe. It’s practical, stylish, and so comfortable—I’m tempted to buy it in more colors! Read more
items.author: TheFoxSaysTwins

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not resemble olive green
items.body: Sweater itself is very nice and fits well. My issue is with the color. I chose the olive green which is beautiful in the photos. The actual color I received is more of a muddy brownish color with almost no detectable green. Will be returning it. Read more
items.author: Jersey Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thrilled!
items.body: Have 6 of these sweaters both with and without lapels - can't get enough! I like that I can wear these over sleeveless tops and keep them on in chilly restaurants unlike jackets that can be uncomfortable while eating. They feel so good on, and I just love the pockets! Read more
items.author: Lynette

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Nutmeg, Burgundy, Opal Green, Black, Lake, Coffee, Navy Blue, Red Khaki, Deep Grey, Dark Green, Olive, Off-white, Khaki, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
